title: Where is MY IP ?
body:
I have unlocked braum {{champion:201}}  and after i left the store and they took my IP , I  went to the champions but braum still locked . I exit and opened the game many times but braum still locked and there is no IP.
the IP was 6325 , but now it 25

replies.body:
Hi summoner, 

Looks like an issue with the store. If you still haven't got Braum I would suggest you send [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Riot. Giving as much detail as you can, such as time of purchase and your IP before and after. 

Here are some guidelines for submitting a support ticket that will ensure the smoothest and fastest response possible:

> Please create a max of 1 ticket about this issue, and do not try to add any information afterwards/submit multiple as it will bump it to the back of the queue. It can take up to 7 business days for them to get back to you (although majority of tickets are answered within 48 hours), so be patient
